page.title: 16FIRE STATION, PENICUIK
page.content: This fire station covers{Penicuik, {Loanhead and Carlops}and is manned by part time staff. They have an average of between{300 to 400 calls a year. They come out to{accidents as well as {fires}and the emergency calls come through the computer instead of the telephone. The firemen carry a bleeper to alert them and it takes them less than{five minutes to get mobile.}Their equipment includes gear for smoke-filled houses and for mouth to mouth resuscitation.{False alarms are {causing problems}in Penicuik. Each {call out,}whether a real emergency or not, costs{Â£200 .
